name: 5 ROOMS
description:
You're an electrician in a world of darkness. You'll need to listen closely to find what you need.   Explore the dark. Meet new friends. Light up the world.

WARNING: This game may contain disturbing or unsettling imagery.

(body horror, cartoon gore, implied cartoon violence, etc.)

This is the demo for 5 ROOMS.

It was created in one week by REINBO (Reiner Ma & Bo Wang).

So far, the demo features one main area. It's pretty barren for now,  but we plan to create four more areas to explore.

If this demo interests you, please give us a follow. The unreleased areas will come... when school stops hurting us.

Created by:

REINBO

Reiner Ma & Bo Wang

Voice Acting:

Reiner Ma - tapeworm

Cleo Ma - breathing BG ambience

Type:

Jake Luedecke - Pixelvetica Font

Plugins:

Special Thanks:

Kevin Kurytnik

Made in RPGMAKER MV
